thread.section_title: EatNow Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EatNow | eatnow.com.au
thread.title: Virginia Re

author: Virginia Re
title: Virginia Re
text: The food hadn't arrived 25 minutes after the scheduled delivery and a subsequent phone call to the supplier revealed that they had a problem with the order. No phone call was made to let us know there was an issue with the order or that it would be late. We then had to pay again direct to the vendor themselves. Very disappointing service although the food was great. I wouldn't use the app again, instead I'd rather just go straight to the vendor.
